title: Ticket #1844: shadow fails to replace output directories in spool
description:
When a non-empty directory exists in the job's spool directory, and this directory is listed in transfer_output_files, and output is being spooled, the shadow fails to replace the existing directory with the new one. The shadow aborts in FileTransfer::CommitFiles() in the following code: 

if ( rotate_file(buf.Value(),newbuf.Value()) < 0 ) {
   EXCEPT("FileTransfer CommitFiles Failed -- What Now?!?!");
}

The reason for failure is that rotate_file() does not support rotation of one directory onto another directory if the target directory is non-empty.
